programme.desc: Cuando Zu deshace sin querer la coleccion de plumas de aves de Lila, ella le pide ayuda a Tio Passarinho para rehacerla mientras aprende que debe contarles lo que siente a sus amigos.

programme.title: Los cazahogares en familia
programme.desc: Una familia busca una casa amplia donde todos puedan tener su propio espacio en Macon, Georgia.

programme.title: Los cazahogares en familia
programme.sub-title: Family of Five Upsizing in Thousand Oaks, CA
programme.desc: Una familia grande busca una casa en Thousand Oaks, California.

programme.title: Little People, Big World
programme.desc: Amy tiene grandes noticias sobre su búsqueda de un nuevo hogar, pero debe lidiar con la realidad de mudarse. Luego, llega el final de una era cuando tienen que derribar la casa del árbol.

programme.title: Todo en 90 días: Antes del viaje
programme.desc: Avery conoce al hermano de Ash. Ed hace un pedido sorprendente. El mayor miedo de Geoffrey acerca de Varya se vuelve realidad. Lisa llega a un punto límite. Yolanda espera no equivocarse. Stephanie y Erika se encuentran.

programme.title: Vestido de novia
programme.desc: Alex busca un Pnina sensual y brillante, Jaqueline quiere algo único y Emily necesita que le limpien el vestido.

programme.title: Gran-diosa
programme.desc: Preocupada por sus pocas probabilidades de tener un hijo,

programme.title: Tacaños extremos
programme.desc: Kate lleva sus metodos de ahorro al extremo, y prefiere buscar restos de comida en la basura para evitar esa clase de gastos. A traves de un nuevo episodio de Tacaños extremos, se mostrará el peculiar estilo de vida que lleva Kate mientras vive en la ciudad de Nueva York.

programme.title: Tacaños extremos
programme.desc: Terence y Greg son personas que buscan maneras extremas para recortar sus gastos. Por un lado, Terence recoge monedas del piso y no da aportes monetarios a su casa. Por otra parte, Greg es un instructor de zumba que descarga su inodoro solo una vez por semana y utiliza cubiertos plásticos.

programme.title: Christina on the Coast
programme.desc: Una enfermera acaba de tener a su cuarto hijo y necesita ayuda con una casa comprada recientemente.

programme.title: Renovaciones en Chicago
programme.desc: Alison Victoria y el contratista Donovan Eckhardt abordan una casa emblemática del siglo XIX en el vecindario Wicker Park de Chicago. Piensan que el enorme tamaño y el potencial de ganancias de la casa hacen que sea una obviedad, pero hay algunas sorpresas.

programme.title: Abismo de pasión
programme.desc: Gael y Damián luchan por el amor de Elisa, pero ella no se decide por uno de los dos. Gael le dice al padre Guadalupe que dos hombres que aman a la misma mujer no pueden ser amigos.

programme.title: Abismo de pasión
programme.desc: Begoña cree que su esposo la está engañando y comienza un escándalo en su consultorio. Kenia le confiesa a Elisa que Gael es su hermano. Paloma se pone celosa de Kenia y trata de seducir a Gael.

programme.title: Abismo de pasión
programme.desc: Elisa y el padre Guadalupe son testigos de momentos comprometedores entre Paloma y Gael. Gael entristece al saber que perdió el amor de Elisa. Elisa decide buscar a Damián para confesarle su amor.

programme.title: Abismo de pasión
programme.desc: Elisa y Damián se alegran porque ya son novios. Gael sufre al no poder olvidar a Elisa. Kenia le confiesa a Gael que son hermanos. Augusto tiene en su poder la prueba de la infidelidad de Carmina.

programme.title: Abismo de pasión
programme.desc: Carmina le hace creer a Augusto que la carta que tiene es de Elisa y él se pregunta quién es el amante de su hija. Alfonsina le dice a Augusto que la carta es de Paolo.

programme.title: Yo no creo en los hombres
programme.desc: Una mujer luchadora trata de salir adelante tras la muerte de su padre y debe hacerse responsable de su familia. Ella busca venganza tras ser engañada por un hombre.

programme.title: Carrusel
programme.desc: Aprovechando la ausencia de la maestra, Pablo suelta el ratón de broma y desata el caos en el salón. Valeria tiene preparada una sorpresa para los niños.

programme.title: Carrusel
programme.desc: La expedición a la casa embrujada no fue completada. Más tarde, unos ladrones roban las gallinas de la casa de María Joaquina, ella los sigue y les exige que le regresen sus gallinas, por lo que la retienen. Todos están en búsqueda de María Joaquina.

programme.title: Carrusel
programme.desc: Miguel y Clara están devastados por la desaparición de María Joaquina. Jaime y los miembros de la Patrulla Salvadora tienen una idea para rescatar a su compañera, para ella necesitan a Rabito.

programme.title: Carrusel
programme.desc: Se lleva a cabo el festejo organizado por Clara y Miguel para los amigos de María Joaquina. La salud de Rabito es bastante precaria y Miguel contrata a un veterinario para que vea al can de Mario.

programme.title: Carrusel
programme.desc: Ramón le da un consejo a Jaime sobre los piropos. Rabito necesita ser inyectado y la maestra Jimena, acompañada de dos alumnos, ayuda a Mario. La salud de Rabito no mejora y necesitan la ayuda de Natalia, quien sigue siendo implacable.

programme.title: El vuelo de la victoria
programme.desc: Adriana amenaza con un arma a Julio para que todos obtengan parte del dinero del secuestro de Victoria, ambos forcejean resultando ella herida y muere en los brazos de Magdalena; Isadora regresa de sorpresa y Raúl no puede creer que esté a su lado.

programme.title: El vuelo de la victoria
programme.desc: Victoria gana su primera carrera y obtiene oro para México, dedica su triunfo a Chencha y muestra que los sueños sí se hacen realidad; Andrés felicita a Victoria por su triunfo y le pide matrimonio frente a todos en el pódium.

programme.title: El vuelo de la victoria

programme.title: Porque el amor manda
programme.desc: Esta es la historia de Jesús y Alma, dos personas que a pesar de ser distintas están destinadas a estar juntas. Jesús, en medio de enredos junto a Alma, deberá encontrar estabilidad en su ciudad natal Monterrey para poder estar al lado de su hija.

programme.title: Sin tu mirada
programme.desc: En una noche de tormenta, nace la bella Marina aparentemente sin vida, justo la misma noche que nace un niño sano, cuya madre no sobrevive; es Damiana, la partera del pueblo, quien mueve los hilos del destino para ofrecer dicha a una familia.

programme.title: Mi pequeña traviesa
programme.desc: Una joven busca trabajo pero descubre que ser mujer no es ningún beneficio, se viste de hombre para laborar en una sastrería y comienza una doble vida hasta que se enamora de un abogado.

programme.title: Peregrina
programme.desc: La joven gitana Peregrina vive y trabaja en un circo itinerante. Allí, conoce a Rodolfo y se enamoran de inmediato, pero no se imaginan que un oscuro secreto del pasado ya los une.

programme.title: La malquerida
programme.desc: La historia de doña Raymunda y su hija, Acacia. Al quedar Raymunda viuda, se casa con Esteban, quien es rechazado por su hija, sin saber que en realidad entre ambos se ha despertado un amor profundo que ocultan tras su máscara de hostilidad.

programme.title: Antes muerta que Lichita
programme.desc: Lichita lleva ocho años trabajando en una agencia de publicidad, en donde se siente subestimada. Un fuerte impulso por cambiar la lleva a una transformación en la que pasa a ser la poderosa de la oficina, con todo lo bueno y malo que eso implica.

programme.title: Teresa
programme.desc: Teresa Chávez es una joven obsesionada por el dinero y la ambición. A pesar de su belleza y de haber crecido en el seno de una familia cariñosa, vive resentida, y su único deseo es abandonar el barrio humilde en el que vive.

programme.desc: En una noche de tormenta, nace la bella Marina aparentemente sin vida, justo la misma noche que nace un niño sano, cuya madre no sobrevive; es Damiana, la partera del pueblo, quien mueve los hilos del destino para ofrecer dicha a una familia.

programme.title: Mi pequeña traviesa
programme.desc: Una joven busca trabajo pero descubre que ser mujer no es ningún beneficio, se viste de hombre para laborar en una sastrería y comienza una doble vida hasta que se enamora de un abogado.

programme.title: Peregrina
programme.desc: La joven gitana Peregrina vive y trabaja en un circo itinerante. Allí, conoce a Rodolfo y se enamoran de inmediato, pero no se imaginan que un oscuro secreto del pasado ya los une.

programme.title: La malquerida
programme.desc: La historia de doña Raymunda y su hija, Acacia. Al quedar Raymunda viuda, se casa con Esteban, quien es rechazado por su hija, sin saber que en realidad entre ambos se ha despertado un amor profundo que ocultan tras su máscara de hostilidad.

programme.title: Antes muerta que Lichita
programme.desc: Lichita lleva ocho años trabajando en una agencia de publicidad, en donde se siente subestimada. Un fuerte impulso por cambiar la lleva a una transformación en la que pasa a ser la poderosa de la oficina, con todo lo bueno y malo que eso implica.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent (Henry Cavill) must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
programme.desc: A chosen hobbit (Elijah Wood) and his loyal friends join a wizard (Ian McKellen), humans, a dwarf and an elf on a quest to destroy a powerful ring and defeat an evil lord.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
programme.desc: Now divided, members of a fellowship take different paths to destroy the ring and defeat evil Sauron and his pawns.

programme.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
programme.desc: Frodo (Elijah Wood) and Sam march toward Mount Doom to destroy the ring, while Gandalf (Ian McKellen) and warriors prepare for a final confrontation with Sauron and his allies.

programme.title: Cop Out
programme.desc: Two veteran NYPD detectives (Bruce Willis, Tracy Morgan) confront a gangster who is obsessed with sports memorabilia in order to retrieve an invaluable baseball card.

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.desc: Acerbic comic Bill Maher welcomes a panel of guests from diverse parts of the political spectrum for a lively discussion of current events, as well as offering his own perspective on contemporary issues.

programme.title: C.B. Strike
programme.desc: A startling discovery seems to confirm the story of the strangled child, but the team are forced to leave the scene before they can properly investigate; fearing their witness is in danger, they redouble their efforts to find him.

programme.title: Malcolm X
programme.desc: The civil-rights leader (Denzel Washington) rises from criminal to crusader, undergoing a religious conversion while jailed.

programme.title: Goodrich
programme.desc: Andy's life gets upended when his wife enters a 90-day rehab program, leaving him in charge of their twins. With his career falling by the wayside, he soon leans on his pregnant daughter for support, ultimately becoming the father she never had.

programme.title: Joker
programme.desc: Isolated, bullied and disregarded by society, failed comedian Arthur Fleck begins a slow descent into madness as he transforms into the criminal mastermind known as the Joker.

programme.title: Joker: Folie à Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck stumbles upon true love while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Awaiting trial for the murder of five people, Fleck soon discovers the music that's always been inside him.

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: A man (Keegan-Michael Key) and his cousin (Jordan Peele) pose as ruthless gangsters to recover a stolen kitten.

programme.title: Keanu
programme.desc: A man (Keegan-Michael Key) and his cousin (Jordan Peele) pose as ruthless gangsters to recover a stolen kitten.

programme.title: Duplicity
programme.desc: Spies (Julia Roberts, Clive Owen) for rival corporations carry on a clandestine love affair while trying to find the formula for a product that will earn a fortune for the company that patents it first.

programme.title: Water for Elephants
programme.desc: A shared compassion for a special elephant draws together a former veterinary student (Robert Pattinson) and a performer (Reese Witherspoon) in the traveling circus in which they both work.

programme.title: Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: A poor boy (Peter Ostrum) and his grandfather (Jack Albertson) win a tour through the marvelous factory of a wily confectioner (Gene Wilder).

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: A poor boy (Freddie Highmore) and four spoiled children win a tour through the incredible factory of an odd confectioner (Johnny Depp).

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: Armed with nothing but a hatful of dreams, young chocolatier Willy Wonka manages to change the world, one delectable bite at a time.

programme.title: Frost/Nixon
programme.desc: An on-air battle of wits ensues when former President Richard Nixon (Frank Langella) selects British TV personality David Frost (Michael Sheen) for an exclusive post-Watergate interview.

programme.title: Life Partners
programme.desc: A 29-year-old lawyer (Gillian Jacobs) and her lesbian best friend (Leighton Meester) experience a dramatic shift in their longtime bond after one enters a serious relationship.

programme.title: C.B. Strike
programme.desc: A startling discovery seems to confirm the story of the strangled child, but the team are forced to leave the scene before they can properly investigate; fearing their witness is in danger, they redouble their efforts to find him.

programme.title: Waitress
programme.desc: A pregnant waitress (Keri Russell) is caught between her controlling husband (Jeremy Sisto) and the new town doctor (Nathan Fillion), with whom she is having a steamy affair.

programme.title: Your Monster
programme.desc: A soft-spoken actress finds her voice again when she meets a terrifying but weirdly charming monster that lives in her closet.

programme.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: A 19th-century martial arts master (Chow Yun-Fat) gives a sword called Green Destiny to his beloved (Michelle Yeoh), then the two must recover it from female thieves.

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: A South Korean family (Song Kang-ho, Byun Hee-bong) must save a daughter (Go Ah-sung) from a horrible monster that emerged from the Han River.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: A huntsman (Chris Hemsworth) and a fellow warrior (Jessica Chastain) battle an ice queen (Emily Blunt) and her evil, resurrected sister (Charlize Theron).

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: A huntsman (Chris Hemsworth) and a fellow warrior (Jessica Chastain) battle an ice queen (Emily Blunt) and her evil, resurrected sister (Charlize Theron).

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending
programme.desc: A genetically engineered soldier (Channing Tatum) informs an ordinary woman (Mila Kunis) of her destiny as the next recipient of an extraordinary inheritance that could alter the balance of the cosmos.

programme.title: Experimenter
programme.desc: In 1961, social psychologist Stanley Milgram (Peter Sarsgaard) conducts controversial experiments designed to measure conformity, conscience and free will.

programme.title: Invictus
programme.desc: Following the fall of apartheid, Nelson Mandela (Morgan Freeman) tries to unite his countrymen by supporting the South African rugby team's underdog bid for the 1995 World Cup Championship.

programme.title: An Update on Our Family
programme.desc: Concerned fans turn to critics; commentators shed light on the Stauffers' catalogue of content, dissecting their lavish lifestyle and their adopted son's treatment; an update from the family results in brands dropping their sponsorship.

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: Young Furiosa gets caught in the crossfire of two tyrannical warlords. As the tyrants fight for dominance, Furiosa soon finds herself in a nonstop battle to make her way home.

programme.title: The Notebook
programme.desc: A man (James Garner) tells a story to a woman about two young people (Ryan Gosling, Rachel McAdams) who become lovers in 1940s North Carolina.

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.desc: Acerbic comic Bill Maher welcomes a panel of guests from diverse parts of the political spectrum for a lively discussion of current events, as well as offering his own perspective on contemporary issues.

programme.title: Goodrich
programme.desc: Andy's life gets upended when his wife enters a 90-day rehab program, leaving him in charge of their twins. With his career falling by the wayside, he soon leans on his pregnant daughter for support, ultimately becoming the father she never had.

programme.title: Final Destination
programme.desc: Teens meet with horrible ends after a classmate's (Devon Sawa) precognitive vision leads to their ejection from a doomed airliner.

programme.title: Final Destination 2
programme.desc: Death returns to claim the lives of those who did not die in a horrible highway calamity as they were meant to do.

programme.title: Final Destination 3
programme.desc: A high-school senior (Mary Elizabeth Winstead) and her friends must deal with repercussions of cheating death when they survive a terrible roller-coaster accident.

programme.title: The Final Destination
programme.desc: A horrifying premonition saves a young man (Bobby Campo) and his friends from death during a racetrack accident, but terrible fates await them nonetheless.

programme.title: Final Destination 5
programme.desc: When a man's premonition saves them from a fatal bridge collapse, several unfortunate souls learn that Death will not be cheated.

programme.title: We Are the Best!
programme.desc: Three rebellious teenagers (Mira Barkhammar, Mira Grosin, Liv LeMoyne) form an all-girl punk band in 1980s Stockholm.

programme.title: We Are the Best!
programme.desc: Three rebellious teenagers (Mira Barkhammar, Mira Grosin, Liv LeMoyne) form an all-girl punk band in 1980s Stockholm.

programme.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
programme.desc: At the urging of the wizard Gandalf (Ian McKellen), unassuming hobbit Bilbo Baggins (Martin Freeman) joins 13 dwarves on a perilous quest to reclaim the kingdom of Erebor and gains possession of the powerful One Ring.

programme.title: Mrs. Doubtfire
programme.desc: Estranged from his wife (Sally Field), an out-of-work actor (Robin Williams) masquerades as a nanny to be with his children.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Undercover Miami detectives (Martin Lawrence, Will Smith) switch lives while investigating murders linked to stolen heroin.

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Two detectives uncover a conspiracy involving a drug kingpin while trying to stop the trafficking of Ecstasy in Miami.

programme.title: Mad Money
programme.desc: Three women (Diane Keaton, Queen Latifah, Katie Holmes) conspire to steal a pile of cash that the Federal Reserve Bank has earmarked for destruction.

programme.title: C.B. Strike
programme.desc: A startling discovery seems to confirm the story of the strangled child, but the team are forced to leave the scene before they can properly investigate; fearing their witness is in danger, they redouble their efforts to find him.

programme.title: Going to Mars: The Nikki Giovanni Project
programme.desc: A look at the life of poet Nikki Giovanni and the revolutionary periods in which she wrote, from the Civil Rights Movement to Black Lives Matter.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: A black Southern woman (Whoopi Goldberg) struggles to find her identity after suffering years of abuse from her father and others over 40 years.

programme.title: Speed
programme.desc: A SWAT team ace (Keanu Reeves) must keep the speed of a Santa Monica bus above 50 mph, or a madman's (Dennis Hopper) bomb will explode.

programme.title: Look Into My Eyes
programme.desc: A group of New York City psychics conducts deeply intimate readings for their clients, revealing a kaleidoscope of loneliness, connection and healing.

programme.title: The Strangers
programme.desc: Three masked assailants terrorize a young couple (Liv Tyler, Scott Speedman) in a romantic getaway to a remote cottage.

programme.title: Midas
programme.desc: After a charismatic college dropout lies his way into a job at an insurance juggernaut, he recruits his two best friends for a plot to steal thousands. In the process, they uncover a much darker scheme that tests the limits of their greed.

programme.title: White House Down
programme.desc: While on a tour of the White House with his young daughter, a police officer springs into action to save his child and the president from a heavily armed group of paramilitary invaders.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: In 13th-century England, a skilled archer (Russell Crowe) and his men confront a despot in a local village and set out to prevent their homeland from erupting in civil war.

programme.title: M3GAN
programme.desc: M3GAN is a marvel of artificial intelligence, a lifelike doll that's programmed to be a child's best friend. When a brilliant roboticist gives her young niece an M3GAN prototype, it soon becomes violent and does anything to protect the girl.

programme.title: The Couple Next Door
programme.desc: The sexual tension between the two couples reaches a boiling point during a weekend away; Alan's obsession with Becka escalates further, with devastating consequences.

programme.title: The Butler
programme.desc: A White House butler (Forest Whitaker) has a front-row seat to history through three decades and seven presidential administrations, including those of Eisenhower (Robin Williams), Kennedy (James Marsden) and Nixon (John Cusack).

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
programme.desc: A space adventurer (Chris Pratt) becomes the quarry of bounty hunters after he steals an orb coveted by a treacherous villain, but after he discovers the orb's true power, he must find a way to unite four ragtag rivals to save the universe.

programme.desc: Raq learns she may have a snitch and tasks Marvin with confirming the rumor; Lou brings in a potential new artist, but he and Crown disagree; Kanan helps Famous sell mix tapes; Jukebox tracks down her estranged mother.
